name: Blue Penguins UK Telecom Ltd
overview:
Blue Penguins offers a range telephones services from a simple divert to a multiple destination hunt service. Blue Penguins offers fax to email service, and a virtual basic switchboard telephone service. Blue Penguins has generous number of telephone numbers available, ranges from freephone, national and local rate numbers. Blue Penguins also offer over six hundred local geographic numbers available, and porting your existing is a available with a small one off porting charge.

Blue Penguins offers a reliable telephone service, from the basic connect telephone service package. Where calls are diverted to single fixed land line or mobile, including a VOIP destination and are ideal for any business and organisations. Advanced voice, the product range includes advanced call diversion service including call hunting and answerphone to email service. Finally the basic switchboard, which is normally available to corporate business, but at a fraction of the cost of purchasing a real switchboard.
